name: A Space Game (TFour)
description:
I have made this for Brackey's 2020.1 Game Jam.

It is a top down puzzle-ish game where your goal is to fly a spaceship to earth, avoiding the pull and time distortion of black holes.

Try finding new ways to beat your records with and without time dilation over five levels.

It might be a  bit easy,  but I hope you have fun while playing it!
